name: Tiny Monkey
description:
JOIN THE DISCORD
Once upon a time, 10 Seconds moneky  fell in lowe with a hooman. The evil  gorilla also liked the Princess and became jealous 10 Second monkey.To win the human the gorilla kidnapped her and cursed the monkey. You must rescue the human! You have 10 seconds to complete each level before the wizard's curse vapourises you.

Use arrow keys to move in game.

Use Esc key for menu.

right arrow to accept menu options
